descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

customerId.name: customerId
customerId.description: ID of the customer whose source to delete
customerId.ai_hint: ID of the customer whose source to delete

token.name: token
token.ai_hint: 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

cardId.name: cardId
cardId.description: ID of the card to remove
cardId.ai_hint: ID of the card to remove

sourceId.name: sourceId
sourceId.description: ID of the source to retrieve
sourceId.ai_hint: ID of the source to retrieve

amount.name: amount
amount.description: Amount in cents to be collected for this charge, e.g. enter 100 for $1.00
amount.ai_hint: Amount in cents to be collected for this charge, e.g. enter 100 for $1.00

currency.name: currency
currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, e.g. USD or EUR. It must be a Stripe-supported currency. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
currency.ai_hint: Three-letter ISO currency code, e.g. USD or EUR. It must be a Stripe-supported currency. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

source.name: source
source.description: ID of the customer's payment source to be charged
source.ai_hint: ID of the customer's payment source to be charged

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: metadata
options.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the source to create

options.name: statement_descriptor
options.description: Arbitrary text to display on the customer's statement

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

chargeId.name: chargeId
chargeId.description: ID of the charge to update
chargeId.ai_hint: ID of the charge to update

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: address
options.description: Address of the customer to update

values.name: line1
values.description: Address line 1 (e.g. street, PO Box, or company name)

values.name: line2
values.description: Address line 2 (e.g. apartment, suite, unit, or building)

values.name: city
values.description: City, district, suburb, town, or village

options.name: description
options.description: Arbitrary text to describe the customer to create

options.name: email
options.description: Email of the customer to create

options.name: metadata
options.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the customer to create

options.name: name
options.description: Full name or business name of the customer to create

values.name: name
values.description: Name of the person who will receive the shipment

values.name: line1
values.description: Address line 1 (e.g. street, PO Box, or company name)

values.name: line2
values.description: Address line 2 (e.g. apartment, suite, unit, or building)

values.name: city
values.description: City, district, suburb, town, or village

values.name: phone
values.description: Phone number of the person who will receive the shipment

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

duration.name: duration
duration.description: How long the discount will be in effect
duration.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

type.name: type
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

amountOff.name: amountOff
amountOff.description: Amount in cents to subtract from an invoice total, e.g. enter 100 for $1.00
amountOff.ai_hint: Amount in cents to subtract from an invoice total, e.g. enter 100 for $1.00

percentOff.name: percentOff
percentOff.description: Percentage to apply with the coupon
percentOff.ai_hint: Percentage to apply with the coupon

name.name: name
name.description: Full name or business name of the customer to create
name.ai_hint: Full name or business name of the customer to create

filters.name: filters
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

eventName.name: eventName
eventName.description: The name of the meter event. Corresponds with the event_name field on a meter.
eventName.ai_hint: The name of the meter event. Corresponds with the event_name field on a meter.

value.name: value
value.description: The value of the meter event. Must be an integer. Can be positive or negative.
value.ai_hint: The value of the meter event. Must be an integer. Can be positive or negative.

cvc.name: cvc
cvc.description: Security code printed on the back of the card
cvc.ai_hint: Security code printed on the back of the card

expirationMonth.description: Number of the month when the card will expire
expirationMonth.name: expirationMonth
expirationMonth.ai_hint: Number of the month when the card will expire

expirationYear.description: Year when the card will expire
expirationYear.name: expirationYear
expirationYear.ai_hint: Year when the card will expire

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'balance' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'customerCard' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'customerCard' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'customerCard' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'token'
IF resource == 'customerCard' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'customerCard' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'cardId'
IF resource == 'customerCard' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'customerCard' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'sourceId'
IF resource == 'charge' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'amount'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'currency'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'source'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'chargeId'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'chargeId'
IF resource == 'charge' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'coupon' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'duration'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'fixedAmount' THEN SHOW parameter 'amountOff'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'fixedAmount' THEN SHOW parameter 'currency'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'percent' THEN SHOW parameter 'percentOff'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'customer' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'meterEvent' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'meterEvent' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventName'
IF resource == 'meterEvent' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'meterEvent' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'meterEvent' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'source' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'source' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'source' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'source' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'amount'
IF resource == 'source' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'currency'
IF resource == 'source' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'source' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'source' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'sourceId'
IF resource == 'source' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'sourceId'
IF resource == 'token' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'token' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'token' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'cardToken' THEN SHOW parameter 'number'
IF resource == 'token' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'cardToken' THEN SHOW parameter 'cvc'
IF resource == 'token' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'cardToken' THEN SHOW parameter 'expirationMonth'
IF resource == 'token' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 'cardToken' THEN SHOW parameter 'expirationYear'
